reviewText: I still have the VHS my mother bought back when this used to air, but no longer have a VCR to play it on.  Hopefully we'll see it on DVD someday.

Saw this documentary when it first aired many years ago and was happy to find a copy of it for sale here on Amazon. If you are from San Francisco and remember the way it was...or even if you aren't but want to know more about what it was like...this is a wonderful documentary with much great footage. And of course, narrated by (the now late) Dave McElhatton--a Bay Area broadcasting icon for decades. Brought back lots of great memories from childhood!
I loved the program so much I was willing to purchase it on VHS.  The video came damaged but was still playable.  I wish it was available in DVD format.
